conbody.p: A tunnel is used to secure the movement of data from one network to another.
enables a secure connection to local resources so that users can test their software/application in a restricted environment, avoiding unwanted external access from the global network.

ul.li: Scale up with team size and work requirements.
Reduce latency to a minimum by deploying the QUIC technology.
Prevent overload and crashes when running many tunnel clients.
Provide security by limiting access to authorized users with API keys.
Save time by running multiple concurrent tests using multiple Edge servers.
